snippet: An occurrence, which recently transpired at one of our most popular Female Seminaries, affords an other and powerful warning to those who are in the habit of indulging in the thoughtless practice of attempting to frighten others....
lead_paragraph: An occurrence, which recently transpired at one of our most popular Female Seminaries, affords an other and powerful warning to those who are in the habit of indulging in the thoughtless practice of attempting to frighten others.
